content:
I started this draft PR and based on feedback I think it's blocked on me. Can someone change the label on it to reflect that?
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/94247

Thanks!
@rustbot author isn't documented in https://github.com/rust-lang/triagebot/wiki/Labeling Am I just looking in the wrong place?

https://github.com/rust-lang/triagebot/wiki/Shortcuts is the documentation - it would be good to link to there from labeling. Would you like to add that paragraph? I'm not sure what permissions are like on the wiki.
